pli-tv-bu-vb-sk27:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk27:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti chaḍḍetukāmā viya …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk27:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti chaḍḍetukāmo viya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
